name: .VIB File Extension
summary: Learn about .VIB files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: VIB files are not meant to be opened. To install a VIB file on an ESXi host (or remove a VIB file from a host), you can use vSphere Update Manager (VUM) or vSphere's ESXCLI command. To add a VIB file to an ESXi image, use vSphere's ESXi Image Builder CLI.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
